# üê¨ bluer-ugv

üê¨ `@ugv` is a [bluer-ai](https://github.com/kamangir/bluer-ai) plugin for UGVs.

```bash
pip install bluer_ugv
```

## designs

|   |   |   |
| --- | --- | --- |
| [`swallow`](./bluer_ugv/docs/swallow) [![image](https://github.com/kamangir/assets2/raw/main/swallow/20250913_203635~2_1.gif?raw=true)](./bluer_ugv/docs/swallow) based on power wheels. | [`arzhang`](./bluer_ugv/docs/arzhang) [![image](https://github.com/kamangir/assets2/raw/main/arzhang/VID-20250905-WA0014_1.gif?raw=true)](./bluer_ugv/docs/arzhang) [swallow](./bluer_ugv/docs/swallow)'s little sister. | [`rangin`](./bluer_ugv/docs/rangin) [![image](https://github.com/kamangir/assets2/raw/main/rangin/20251224_182306~3_1.gif)](./bluer_ugv/docs/rangin) [swallow](./bluer_ugv/docs/swallow)'s ad robot. |
| [`ravin`](./bluer_ugv/docs/ravin) [![image](https://github.com/kamangir/assets2/raw/main/ravin/20250723_095155~2_1.gif?raw=true)](./bluer_ugv/docs/ravin) remote control car kit for teenagers. | [`eagle`](./bluer_ugv/docs/eagle) [![image](https://github.com/kamangir/assets2/raw/main/eagle/file_0000000007986246b45343b0c06325dd.png?raw=true)](./bluer_ugv/docs/eagle) a remotely controlled ballon. | [`fire`](./bluer_ugv/docs/fire) [![image](https://github.com/kamangir/assets/raw/main/bluer-ugv/fire.png?raw=true)](./bluer_ugv/docs/fire) based on a used car. |
| [`beast`](./bluer_ugv/docs/beast) [![image](https://github.com/waveshareteam/ugv_rpi/raw/main/media/UGV-Rover-details-23.jpg)](./bluer_ugv/docs/beast) based on [UGV Beast PI ROS2](https://www.waveshare.com/wiki/UGV_Beast_PI_ROS2). |  |  |
